line_1: Whose glory with a light that never fades,
line_2: Shoots between scattered rocks and opening shades,

line_1: Of drizly eve prevail, by instinct fades.
line_2: By instinct blows at morn, and, when the shades

line_1: When droops the sickening herb, the blossom fades,
line_2: And parch'd earth gapes beneath the withering glades.

line_1: Thus the proud steed, when youthful glory fades,
line_2: And creeping age his stiffening limbs invades,

line_1: The op'ning rose of youth untimely fades,
line_2: And Hope's fair friendly light beams dimly thro' the shades.

line_1: Ha! while I gaze, pale Cynthia fades,
line_2: The bursting Earth unveils the Shades!
